changeSet.author: Supriya
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Colposcopy Record Form

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes","No") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CR, Normal");

changeSet.author: Supriya
